title: User wants to see Enter Requests and Claims tabs differently in ribbon
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to view waivers screen
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to waivers screen and views ribbon
custom_expected:
THEN flags that were previously in dark blue should be green
AND flags that were previously in light blue should be dark blue
AND time alone should drive when hint text appears  (Enter Requests at 2:00 PM on the Request Date and Enter Claims at 1:00 PM on the Claim Expiration Date)

title: Trade waivers for player on option should be secured through the end of the season
custom_preconds:
GIVEN TRD waivers have been requested for a player
AND the player is currently Optioned
custom_steps: WHEN TRD waiver becomes Secured (unclaimed, results bulletin sent)
custom_expected: THEN results should read "Secured through the conclusion of the Championship Season" just as it does for those players not on option

title: Remove time from waivers adv search for Clubs
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is logged in with permission to perform waiver adv search
custom_steps: WHEN club user perform waiver adv search
custom_expected:
THEN "Entry Time" column should not display
BUT BOC should continue to see the column

title: Secured should be blank in player profile until results bulletin is sent
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a waiver request has been submitted for a player
AND relevant Request Bulletin has been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to waivers history section of player's profile
custom_expected:
THEN "Secured" column should remain blank until the Results Bulletin has actually been sent
BUT once Results Bulletin has been sent, the column should be updated with "Yes" or "No" based on whether or not the player had waiver secured

title: User wants to request waivers for players on inactive list
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to submit waiver requests
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to player dropdown in request entry section of waivers screen
custom_expected:
THEN Players with the following MJ Roster Statuses should appear in the player dropdown so that waivers may be requested for them:
- Military Leave
- Disqualified
- Restricted
- Designated for Assignment
- Ineligible
- Deceased

title: User wants to receive error if they request waivers for player on Inactive List
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to submit waiver requests
custom_steps:
WHEN user selects a player with one of the following roster statuses:
- Military Leave
- Disqualified
- Restricted
- Ineligible
- Deceased
- Suspended
AND clicks Save or Submit to BOC
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error "Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] is on the [Inactive List Type] list and must be reinstated before waivers may be requested.‚Äù
AND clicking back should return user to the form
AND clicking Ignore and Continue should ignore the error and continue with the workflow (BOC Only)

title: User wants to generate blank Notice to Player of Intention of Unconditional Release letter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to print player letters
AND "Notice to Player of Intention of Unconditional Release" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters"
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Notice to Player of Intention of Unconditional Release"
custom_expected:
THEN system should print the proper pdf of the letter
AND users should have the ability to choose whether to print the letter in English or Spanish
AND form should be generated in English if the language selected is English
BUT form should be generated in Spanish if the language selected is Spanish
AND pdf should follow the provided format and details

title: User wants to generate blank Notice to Player of UR and Termination of MJ League Contract letter
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to print player letters
AND "Notice to Player of UR and Termination of Major League Contract" appears as an option in the Reporting widget under the Type "Blank Letters"
custom_steps: WHEN user selects "Notice to Player of UR and Termination of Major League Contract"
custom_expected:
THEN system should print the proper pdf of the letter
AND users should have the ability to choose whether to print the letter in English or Spanish
AND form should be generated in English if the language selected is English
BUT form should be generated in Spanish if the language selected is Spanish
AND pdf should follow the provided format and details

title: Club user doesn't want to see Player Accept/Player Reject after action has been taken on player
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user is logged in
AND club user has navigated to waivers screen 
AND user has selected a request date for which results bulletin has been sent
custom_steps: WHEN user views the claims/results section
custom_expected:
THEN if Club can Player Accept or Player Reject, then split button should be available with "Player Notif.", "Player Accept", "Player Reject" and "Cancel" available. (requested UR waivers that were Claimed and not Cancelled for which a waiver claim assignment has not yet been created.)
AND once "Player Accept" or "Player Reject" has been selected for a player, BOTH of these options should no longer display for that player

title: Waivers Performance Improvements
custom_preconds: GIVEN there are numerous places that waivers performance could be improved
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Waivers screen and attempts to execute any part of the workflow
custom_expected:
THEN system should allow user to enter 7 players in 1:40 or less
AND when user clicks "Submit" system should generate any blockers/errors within 2 seconds
AND once user overrides any errors system should throw successful submission notification in less than 9 seconds
AND total Waiver Request Entry time should take 2:22 or less
AND time taken for any other areas of waivers workflow should match metrics found in EBIS test

title: User wants to receive failure notification for all emails
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in as club or BOC
AND emails are turned on
AND user has a valid email address entered in the Email Utility with "Send Failure Notification" checked off
custom_steps: WHEN any emails fail being sent
custom_expected:
THEN format of the body of the email should be " Name - Org - <e-mail address> " , using the information populated in the email utility
AND The subject line should be "Error sending <Email Type> Emails"
(example shown in attached story)

title: WCA automatically created for irrevocable waivers upon sending results bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN non-UR Irrevocable waivers have been requested for one or more players
AND these waivers have been claimed
custom_expected:
THEN a waiver claim assignment should be created and submitted to BOC for these players
AND for Outright Waivers, the Waiver Claim Assignment should have a Cash Consideration of $20,000 unless the player was Rule 5 DE/SEL, then it should be be $25,000
AND for all waivers, the player should be listed as long as the Cash Consideration and that is it
AND clubs should not be able to manipulate the terms at all in the Submitted to BOC state

title: User wants to create Waiver Claim Assignment - Player Accept
custom_preconds:
GIVEN waivers have been requested for a player
AND relevant request bulletin has been sent
AND waivers have been claimed by one or more orgs
AND relevant results bulletin has been sent
AND user has navigated to the player table in Claims/results section on waivers screen
AND "Player Accept" is available in a split button next to this player's name
custom_expected:
THEN system should create a preliminary waiver claim assignment for the selected player and redirect the user to the transaction
AND Waiver Claim Assignment should have the creating Org's consideration be for the player, and the claiming Org's Cash Consideration = $1
AND  player the waivers were requested for should NOT be able to be removed from the transaction
AND if a preliminary waiver claim assignment already exists for the selected player, the system should redirect the user to the existing waiver claim assignment instead of creating a new one
AND club should have the ability to add additional players and conditions as needed, then the WCA should follow the stateflow of a Trade

title: User wants to receive error if Waiver Claim Assignment does not meet required criteria
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player has been claimed on waivers
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Claim Assignment for this player
custom_steps: WHEN user submits Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_expected:
THEN system should check that cash Considerations contain at least $20K (not conditional) or a second player (could be P2BNL).
BUT this rule should not apply to UR waivers who are R5 Draft Excluded or Selected.
AND if this rule is violated, system should display Error Message #47.

title: BOC user wants to approve Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a BOC user is logged in 
AND a Waiver Claim Assignment has been submitted for a player
AND BOC user has navigated to the submitted Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_expected:
THEN system should run all On Approve rule checks that would run on an outright trade
AND once all rule checks pass, the Waiver Claim Assignment should be marked as "Approved"
AND system should Follow all On Approve rules listed for Outright Trades, including:
- Daily Transaction Bulletin entry
- Player History entry
- Auto-Creation of a Recall where applicable
- Roster Status, Club and Player Info updates.
- Clearing of the Approvals item for the BOC and generation of a notification for the involved Clubs

title: Recalculate CBT impact on approval of Waiver Claim Assignment
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Waiver Claim Assignment has been submitted for a Player
custom_steps: WHEN the Waiver Claim Assignment reaches a status of Approved
custom_expected: THEN system should recalculate the CBT impact of the player

title: User wants Release from Roster approval to appear in Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Release From Roster transaction has been created for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the Release From Roster transaction reaches a status of Approved
custom_expected: THEN transaction should be added to the Daily Transaction Bulletin
